   By Miriam Valverde December 13, 2018

Website falsely claims United Nations 'caught helping and coaching' migrants

   The United Nations has not been "caught helping and coaching" caravans of
   migrants who want to come to the United States.

Our ruling

   A post on usanetwork.info says, "United Nations caught helping and
   coaching caravan illegal aliens!"
